resources.string: Add songs from other apps to your Spotify music collection. \n\n It currently supports adding songs from the YouTube Android app. If you are watching a video and are feeling the song, do a \"Share...\" to Musica to add the song to your Spotify collection!
Sorry, we were not able to find \'%s\' on Spotify :(
